refnamediv.refpurpose: Should qandaentry questions appear in the document table of contents?

refsection.para: If true (non-zero), then the generated table of contents for a document will include qandaset titles, qandadiv titles, and question elements. The default value (zero) excludes them from the TOC.
This parameter does not affect any tables of contents that may be generated inside a qandaset or qandadiv.
